name: Word Diamonds: daily crossword
description:
Scrabble meets Boggle in this new crossword puzzle! Word Diamonds is the perfect daily game to challenge your mind.

· Over 230+ levels in the debut version of Word Diamonds!
· Swipe letters to find words and fill up the gameboard
· Earn gems for completing each level and spend them for hints
· Start off easy then progress through harder and harder levels
· Challenge yourself intellectually to a fun and addictive game with an upbeat soundtrack!
